definition[0]: used to ask someone not to leave or start doing something immediately
example[0]: Wait a second, I’ll get my coat and come with you.
example[1]: Wait a moment, just let me think.
definition[1]: used to interrupt someone, especially because you do not agree with what they are saying
example[2]: Wait a minute! That’s not what we agreed!
definition[2]: used when you suddenly think of, remember, or notice something
example[3]: Wait a minute, I’ve got a better idea.
